casebody.data:
GIBBS
v.
DAISY. No. 380P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for William Daisy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration and Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court In conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
